casebody.data:
In the Matter of S.M., C.E., E.E. No. 65P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 3, 2007. Lori Christian, Assistant County Attorney, for Wake County DSS. Angela Haas, Raleigh, for Michael Evans. Rick Croutharmel, for Guardian ad Litem.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd day of March 2007 by Respondent (Mother) to Withdraw Petition for Discretionary Review/Petition for Writ or Certiorari:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of May 2007."
